description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期由南梁宗室萧詧在西魏扶植下建立的割据政权，都于江陵。历三帝，共三十三年，后被隋朝所灭。
description.en: A remnant state established by Xiao Cha of the Liang imperial clan during the Northern and Southern dynasties period of China, with the support of the Western Wei. Its capital was at Jiangling. It lasted for thirty-three years under three emperors before being annexed by the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的南朝朝代之一，西梁为其残存政权。
description.en: A dynasty of the Southern dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period of China, of which the Western Liang was a remnant state.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝的朝代，灭亡了西梁。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that succeeded the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceded the Tang dynasty, which conquered the Western Liang.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的国家，支持萧詧建立西梁。
description.en: A state during the Northern and Southern dynasties period of China that supported Xiao Cha in establishing the Western Liang.

description.zh-cn: 西梁开国皇帝，庙号中宗。在西魏支持下于江陵称帝，建立西梁政权。
description.en: The founding emperor of Western Liang, with the temple name Zhongzong. He established the Western Liang regime by declaring himself emperor in Jiangling with the support of the Western Wei.

description.zh-cn: 西梁第二位皇帝，梁宣帝萧詧之子，庙号世宗。
description.en: The second emperor of Western Liang, son of Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha), with the temple name Shizong.

description.zh-cn: 西梁末代皇帝，梁明帝萧岿之子。后被隋文帝废黜，封为莒国公。
description.en: The last emperor of Western Liang, son of Emperor Ming (Xiao Kui). He was later deposed by Emperor Wen of Sui and enfeoffed as the Duke of Ju.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝开国皇帝，废除了西梁政权。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Sui dynasty, who abolished the Western Liang regime.

description.zh-cn: 西梁的国都。
description.en: The capital of the Western Liang.

description.zh-cn: 南梁皇帝，在江陵被西魏所杀。
description.en: An emperor of the Southern Liang dynasty who was killed by the Western Wei in Jiangling.

description.zh-cn: 南梁昭明太子，梁宣帝萧詧之父，被其子追赠为皇帝。
description.en: Crown Prince Zhaoming of the Southern Liang dynasty, father of Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha), who was posthumously honored as an emperor by his son.

description.zh-cn: 南北朝时期南梁将领，其控制的长沙、武陵等地曾被西梁攻占。
description.en: A general of the Southern Liang dynasty during the Northern and Southern dynasties period, whose controlled territories including Changsha and Wuling were once captured by the Western Liang.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝封爵，为西梁末帝萧琮被废黜后的封号。
description.en: A noble title of the Sui dynasty, granted to Xiao Cong, the last emperor of Western Liang, after his deposition.

description.zh-cn: 梁宣帝萧詧的曾孙，在隋朝末年自立为梁帝。
description.en: The great-grandson of Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha), who declared himself Emperor of Liang during the late Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 555年，萧詧在西魏支持下于江陵称帝，建立西梁政权。
description.en: In 555, Xiao Cha, with the support of the Western Wei, declared himself emperor in Jiangling, establishing the Western Liang regime.

description.zh-cn: 西魏支持梁宣帝（萧詧）在江陵称帝。
description.en: The Western Wei supported Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha) in declaring himself emperor in Jiangling.

description.zh-cn: 西梁开国皇帝萧詧向西魏称臣，使西梁成为西魏的附庸国。
description.en: The founding emperor of Western Liang, Xiao Cha, declared allegiance to the Western Wei, making Western Liang a vassal state.

description.zh-cn: 554年，西魏攻陷江陵，杀害了南梁皇帝梁元帝。
description.en: In 554, the Western Wei captured Jiangling and killed Emperor Yuan of the Southern Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 587年，隋朝遣军吞并西梁，西梁灭亡。
description.en: In 587, the Sui dynasty dispatched an army to annex the Western Liang, leading to its demise.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝下令废除西梁政权。
description.en: Emperor Wen of Sui ordered the abolition of the Western Liang regime.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝召西梁末帝萧琮入朝，废除其帝位，并将其封为莒国公。
description.en: Emperor Wen of Sui summoned Xiao Cong, the last emperor of Western Liang, to the court, deposed him, and enfeoffed him as the Duke of Ju.

description.zh-cn: 587年，萧琮被隋文帝废黜后，受封为莒国公。
description.en: In 587, after being deposed by Emperor Wen of Sui, Xiao Cong was enfeoffed as the Duke of Ju.

description.zh-cn: 梁明帝萧岿是梁宣帝萧詧的太子。
description.en: Emperor Ming (Xiao Kui) was the crown prince of Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha).

description.zh-cn: 萧琮是梁明帝萧岿的太子。
description.en: Xiao Cong was the crown prince of Emperor Ming (Xiao Kui).

description.zh-cn: 梁宣帝萧詧是南梁昭明太子萧统的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha) was the son of Crown Prince Zhaoming (Xiao Tong) of the Southern Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 萧铣是西梁开国皇帝梁宣帝（萧詧）的曾孙。
description.en: Xiao Xian was the great-grandson of the founding emperor of Western Liang, Emperor Xuan (Xiao Cha).

description.zh-cn: 558年，西梁一度攻占了由王琳控制的长沙郡、武陵郡、南平郡。
description.en: In 558, the Western Liang temporarily captured the commanderies of Changsha, Wuling, and Nanping, which were controlled by Wang Lin.

description.zh-cn: 西梁是南梁在梁元帝于江陵被杀后残存的政权。
description.en: Western Liang was the remnant state of the Southern Liang dynasty after Emperor Yuan was killed in Jiangling.
